data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pecci-Maddalena, Italo Salvatore De Castro, Lopes-Andrade, Cristiano, Skelley, Paul (2019): Xalpirta mauryi sp. nov. (Coleoptera: Erotylidae: Tritomini) from Southeast Brazil. Zootaxa 4629 (3): 342-350, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4629.3.2|7 occurrences
